ValidationRule.description: Please Remove this validation rule after December 2020.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Qualified"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Verified"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "MyPost Business") ), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BG_Standard', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack_Lead' ), OR(ISBLANK(FirstName), ISBLANK(LastName), ISBLANK(Email), ISBLANK(Street), ISBLANK(City), ISBLANK(State), ISBLANK(PostalCode), ISBLANK(TEXT(Customer_Type__c)), AND(ISBLANK(Phone), ISBLANK(MobilePhone))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide First Name, Last Name, Email, Address with Postal Code, Customer Type and either 'Phone or Mobile' prior to qualifying the Lead or converting the Lead into an Opportunity
